tasks.task_description: Initialize CDK TypeScript project using cdk init
Create Vite React TypeScript project using npm create vite@latest
Install CDK dependencies for S3, CloudFront, Cognito, Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB
Install frontend dependencies for AWS Amplify auth and API calls
Create CDK stack with S3 bucket and CloudFront distribution
Add Cognito User Pool and Identity Pool to CDK stack
Create DynamoDB table for todos in CDK stack
Create Lambda function for todo CRUD operations
Add API Gateway with Cognito authorizer to CDK stack
Configure Vite frontend with Cognito authentication
Add todo management UI components to frontend
Connect frontend to API Gateway endpoints

description: Create CDK repo with S3 static website hosting, Vite frontend, Cognito auth, Lambda API, and DynamoDB
